Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Ave/Cicero
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave., Cicero and Grand: due to, street blockage near  North Ave/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave., Cicero and Grand: due to, street blockage near  North Ave/Cicero.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
